title: Intro to Web Dev Workshop
short: Learn HTML, CSS, and JS in this beginner-friendly workshop.
description: A hands-on workshop covering fundamentals of modern web development. Bring your laptop.

title: Campus Hackathon 48h
short: Build and ship a project in 48 hours.
description: Teams of up to 4 will build prototypes based on themes. Prizes for winners.

title: AI & ML Seminar
short: Guest talk on AI careers and projects.
description: Industry guest presents on how to start AI projects and build portfolios.
